issue.title: www.dropout.tv

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter 2.0.58.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.dropout.tv/make-some-noise/season:2/videos/100000-batmans

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

When `collector.vhx.tv` is blocked, the service is unable to check user rights for content and fails to play with error: "Sorry, you are not authorized to watch this video." This breaks all streaming platforms that rely on Vimeo OTT/VHX to deliver content. Relevant issue: #89165, where the item was first added to the list.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Hi, I'm unable to boot my PC right now so I'll keep you posted when that
changes and I'm able to test that, but right now I'm testing on mobile and
even with the filter on, it appears to work despite `collector.vhx.tv`
still being blocked, so this might be a case of it only breaking on desktop.

On Wed, Jul 12, 2023, 6:06 AM jellizaveta ***@***.***> wrote:

> @MisterSheeple <https://github.com/MisterSheeple> hello! If you disable
> the Tracking Protection filter filter and open the site in incognito mode,
> does the issue persist?
>
> —

issue.body:
# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [x] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address ### Add your comment and screenshots These websites have a common design with nicochannel.

issue.title: Incorrect Block
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0.912

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Cannot access the following URL in the app's internal browser. https://www.ksdenki.com/sp/app/anpass/customer/topmenu.aspx

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
   1) Install "K's Denki Anshin Passport App" from the Play Store.
   2) Open "K's Denki Anshin Passport App" and tap "Click here to register".
   3) An error message "Communication could not be established" appears.
   4) The page that should be displayed is supposed to be blocked.
   5) When AdGuard is disabled or the DNS filter function of AdGuard is disabled, the "K's Denki Anshin Passport App" behaves correctly
We wish to exclude pages under the following directories from communication blocking.
https://www.ksdenki.com/sp/app/anpass/

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![1)-Install--K's-Denki-Anshin-Passport-App](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/139418235/ea905b43-702c-4416-b710-9be882d7ef8d)
![2)-tap-Click-here-to-register](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/139418235/a18de26b-f2cf-4614-a884-2f9e06293a4a)
![3) Communication-could-not-be-established](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/139418235/9e04aa7b-cfa6-46d5-9181-d1ebf32f8117)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

comment.body:
If you encounter the unwanted phenomenon that your chrome web browser opens a website like you reported, please scan your computer to find a PUP with an anti-virus.

Or, if you encounter the phenomenon while browsing the web, please re-report your issue **with the original URL**.

pull_request.title: Fix webextension.org Ad,Cookie
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address 1. `https://webextension.org/blog/2022/09/11/review-of-the-goggle-play-protect-app.html` 2. `https://webextension.org/listing/ocr.html` ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. `webextension.org##.adb` 2. `webextension.org###adb` , `webextension.org###cookie`
screenshot - 1 ![](https://i.postimg.cc/gkWGZwtk/image.png)

screenshot - 2 ![](https://i.postimg.cc/YqnQ9w8R/image.png)

### Terms - [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/150340#issuecomment-1631138661 you should enable AdGuard Popups, but it's better if you install AdGuard Extra.

---

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Лучше связаться с разработчиками как было сказано ранее.

```adblock
gosuslugi.ru#%#//scriptlet('prevent-addEventListener', '/keydown|paste/')
```

comment.body:
Resolved by List-KR filter.
The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` after clicking AdGuard icon in macOS menu bar.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 macOS 메뉴 바에 있는 AdGuard 아이콘을 누르신 후에 `필터 업데이트`를 클릭함으로써 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>

Alternately you guys can also use whichever entries you guys would write. > > The entry has worked for at least 2 months now, even if there still may be other Tumblr-side annoyances remaining (Most notably that the ••• buttons don't work after scrolling down slightly, which I never found a good fix for). ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Yet another further update for OP (Not to Morku):

`||assets.tumblr.com/pop/js/modern/async-login-wall$script,1p` works sometimes, but doesn't seem like a fix-all miracle after all. In the meantime, I found out why the •••-buttons weren't working in Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List and have now come up with an improved entry: `tumblr.com#?##glass-container > div[role=dialog]:has(p + p):has(a[href^="/auth/google?"])`
